title: M-x gofmt command in Emacs go-mode clears the buffer under certain conditions
body:
Before filing a bug, please check whether it has been fixed since
the latest release: run "hg pull -u" and retry what you did to
reproduce the problem.  Thanks.

What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. Open a new, empty go source file in Emacs with go-mode installed
2. Type in the following program:
----
package main
func main() {}

----
3. Call M-x gofmt

What is the expected output? What do you see instead?

The buffer should be filtered though gofmt. Instead, the buffer is emptied,
and the error message "Args out of range: 0, 1" is displayed in the bottom
of the Emacs screen.

What is your $GOOS?  $GOARCH?

linux 386

Which revision are you using?  (hg identify)

84c2d8accf42+ tip

Please provide any additional information below.
